name: TG SMS Bomber
description: [MsgBomberTGBot] An open-source SMS bomber bot for Telegram. Inspired by TheSpeedX's Project

BOT_TOKEN.description: The bot-token which you can get from @Botfather

AUTH_USERS.description: There is no measure to limit who can use this bot, so add userids of users authorized to use this bot

NO_BOMB_NUMS.description: Add numbers below who shouldn't be bombed ever

GOD_USERS.description: Add userids below of users who should have sudo authority over bot, i.e., have no bombing limits

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable VARs when in ENV mode
